public_key.label: Product activation key
public_key.comment: Enter the Novalnet Product activation key that is required for authentication and click Activate. You will find the Product activation key in the Novalnet Admin Portal: PROJECT > Choose your project > Shop Parameters > API Signature (Product activation key).

subsequent_period.label: Period for subsequent subscription cycle

live_mode.label: Novalnet Live Mode

restore_cart.label: Products remain in the shopping cart after cancelled payment

test_mode.label: Allow manual testing of the Notification / Webhook URL
test_mode.comment: Enable this to test the Novalnet Notification / Webhook URL manually. Disable this before setting your shop live to block unauthorized calls from external parties

vendor_script_log.label: Novalnet merchant script log

vendor_script_url.label: Notification / Webhook URL
